reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Reroute emails' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Reroute emails' to appear in the list.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Development' menu link.
Click the 'Reroute Email' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Reroute Email dialog'.
Enter 'Pub7NBCUAutoEmailUser1@gmail.com' in the 'Email addresses' text box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'People' menu link.
Click the 'Add user' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Enter '65842ef31eca4fa@af1faecd068d4be.com' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter '65842ef31eca4fa@af1faecd068d4be.com' in the 'E-mail address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Check the 'editor' checkbox.
Enter '2597bd171d1149a' in the 'First Name' text box.
Enter '13e7cfd6ec7148a' in the 'Last Name' text box.
Click the 'Create new account' button.
Verify success message of 'A welcome message with further instructions has been e-mailed to the new user 65842ef31eca4fa@af1faecd068d4be.com.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify that the auto email titled 'An administrator created an account for you at Site-Install' arrives in the gmail inbox.

Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Check the 'editor' checkbox.
Enter '2597bd171d1149a' in the 'First Name' text box.
Enter '13e7cfd6ec7148a' in the 'Last Name' text box.
Click the 'Create new account' button.
Verify success message of 'A welcome message with further instructions has been e-mailed to the new user 65842ef31eca4fa@af1faecd068d4be.com.' is present.
